titleStmt.title: An answer to a pamphlet called, The true Protestants appeal to the city and country. Being a vindication of the dissenting Protestants in general; and Mr. Sheriff Bethell in particular. By a truer Protestant..
titleStmt.author: Truer Protestant.

notesStmt.note: A reply to the work by John Nalson.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
